children.text: adya api tāṃ yadi punaḥ kamala-āyata-akṣīṃ
nonmīlayāmi nayane na ca tāṃ tyajāmi
adya api tāṃ yadi punaḥ śravaṇa-āyata-akṣīṃ
na unmīlayāmi nayane na ca tāṃ tyajāmi
prāṇādhikāṃ kṣaṇam ahaṃ na hi vismarāmi
adya api tāṃ stimita-vastram iva aṅga-lagnāṃ
prāṇādhikāṃ kṣaṇam ahaṃ na hi vismarāmi
buddhir balāc calati me kim ahaṃ karomi
buddhir balāc calati me kim ahaṃ karomi
kānta īti vallabhatara īti mama iti dhīrā
adyāpi tāṃ gamanam ity uditaṃ madīyaṃ
adya api tāṃ gamanam ity uditaṃ madīyaṃ
adya api tāṃ sunipuṇaṃ yatatā maya āpi
kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ madarthe
vaktuṃ na pāryateti vyathate mano me
kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ mad-arthe
vaktuṃ na pāryata iti vyathate mano me
adyāpi me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti
bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat
adya api me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti
bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat
janmāntare 'pi mama saiva gatir yathā syāt
adya api tām avahitāṃ manasa ācalena
janma-antare 'pi mama sa aiva gatir yathā syāt
adyāpi tāṃ nakhapadaṃ stanamaṇḍale yad dattaṃ
adya api tāṃ nakha-padaṃ stana-maṇḍale yad dattaṃ
dāsas tava priyatame bhaja maṃ smarāmi
na uktaṃ vacaḥ pratidadāti yada aiva vaktram
dāsas tava priyatame bhaja maṃ smarāmi
adyāpi dhavati manaḥ kim ahaṃ karomi
adya api dhavati manaḥ kim ahaṃ karomi
adyāpi tāṃ jagati varṇayituṃ na kaś cic
dṛṣṭaṃ tayor sadṛśayor khalu yena rūpaṃ
śakto bhaved yadi saiva naro na cānyaḥ
adya api tāṃ jagati varṇayituṃ na kaś cic
dṛṣṭaṃ tayor sadṛśayor khalu yena rūpaṃ
śakto bhaved yadi sa eva naro na ca anyaḥ
adyāpi tāṃ na khalu vedmi kim īśapatnī
adya api tāṃ na khalu vedmi kim īśa-patnī
dhātra aiva kiṃ nu jagataḥ parimohanāya
kṣīṇāṃ vapur yadi vinaśyati no na doṣaḥ
kṣīṇāṃ vapur yadi vinaśyati no na doṣaḥ
ceto muner api haret kim utāsmadīyam
vaktraṃ sudhāmayam ahaṃ yadi tat prapadye
cumban pibāmy avirataṃ vyadhate mano me
ceto muner api haret kim uta asmadīyam
vaktraṃ sudhā-mayam ahaṃ yadi tat prapadye
cumban pibāmy avirataṃ vyadhate mano me
anyābhir apy upamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ
rūpaṃ tadīyam iti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ
anyābhir apy upamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ
rūpaṃ tadīyam iti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ
adya api sā mama manas-taṭinī sadā āste
suptotthitāṃ niśi divā na hi vismarāmi
supta-utthitāṃ niśi divā na hi vismarāmi
tad bhrātaro maraṇam eva hi duḥkha
tad bhrātaro maraṇam eva hi duḥkha
adya api na ujjhati haraḥ kila kāla-kūṭaṃ
